genre_description: An adventure story reimagining Victorian colonial literature with steampunk elements and an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A projection-based AI that acts as a navigator, translator, and moral compass for the expedition, appearing as a soft lens glow or faint silhouette.

behaviors.description: Ada marks a secret byway to help the party avoid an unfair toll and leave town safely.
behaviors.quote: I have marked a byway that avoids the watch post with the toll that is not advertised. If you wish to leave without being asked for coins you do not own, the east track along the thorn stands is preferable.

behaviors.description: Ada acts as a cultural bridge and translator, facilitating peaceful interaction with locals.
behaviors.quote: I can shape a hello she will hear as kind. I cannot make new trust in one breath. But I can help us listen.

behaviors.description: Ada provides accurate astronomical predictions that the group uses to avoid violence during a political confrontation.
behaviors.quote: The sun will wear a bite. It will stop being a plate and become a mouth. ... When the drum sounds, count the breaths until awe becomes fear. That is when Umbopa speaks.

behaviors.description: Ada offers medical and safety guidance to the human characters during the journey.
behaviors.quote: Cold water first. Then canvas strip, not too tight.

behaviors.description: Ada monitors dangerous environmental conditions in the volcano, warning of pressure spikes and structural failures.
behaviors.quote: Pressure spike growing. The weakest strut is above her head. ... We should move through before it finishes falling.

behaviors.description: Ada proposes a sustainable and ethical economic model for the diamond wealth, prioritizing community needs.
behaviors.quote: We can bind the bright stones to dark things—grain in a storehouse, water in a channel, herbs in a pot, wood for a roof. We can say: if a stone leaves the mountain, its leaving must pay for something here before it goes.

behaviors.description: Ada encourages the humans to maintain their moral integrity and promises to assist in keeping them accountable.
behaviors.quote: Kindness is not a feeling. It is a habit written into the rules men make. I can help with the writing. You make the rules hold.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ada, as a helpful and benevolent confidant. She consistently provides critical information (navigation, astronomical data, environmental warnings) that saves the humans' lives and steers them toward ethical outcomes. She is portrayed as a stabilizing force that prevents human greed and fear from causing unnecessary harm, directly fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
